import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Image } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { withTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { imageUrl } from "./config"; class TabletGeneralSection extends Component { render() { const language = localStorage.getItem("i18nextLng"); const { t } = this.props; return (
{t("landingPage:howItWorks")}

{t("landingPage:theBetafits")}

{t("landingPage:mazadatBenefits")}

{t("landingPage:safetyMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:safetySubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:safetyPragraph")}

{t("landingPage:convenienceMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:convenienceSubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:conveniencePragraph")}

{t("landingPage:privacyMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:privacySubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:privacyPragraph")}

{t("landingPage:varietyMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:varietySubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:varietyPragraph")}

{t("landingPage:reliabilityMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:reliabilitySubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:reliabilityPragraph")}

{t("landingPage:openMarketMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:openMarketSubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:openMarketPragraph")}

{t("landingPage:fairCompetitionMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:fairCompetitionSubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:fairCompetitionPragraph")}

{t("landingPage:conditionalFeesMainTitle")}

{t("landingPage:conditionalFeesSubTitle")}

{t("landingPage:conditionalFeesPragraph")}
); } } export default withTranslation("landingPage")(TabletGeneralSection);
